channel.title: This American Life
channel.description: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 2.5 million people download the weekly podcast. It is hosted by Ira Glass, produced in collaboration with Chicago Public Media, delivered to stations by PRX The Public Radio Exchange, and has won all of the major broadcasting awards.
channel.itunes:author: This American Life
channel.itunes:subtitle: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 2.5 million people download the weekly podcast.

item.title: 693: Abdi the American
item.description: We return to our story about Abdi Nor from 2015, with some news about his life today.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: We return to our story about Abdi Nor from 2015, with some news about his life today.
item.itunes:summary: We return to our story about Abdi Nor from 2015, with some news about his life today.

item.title: 692: The Show of Delights
item.description: In these dark, combative times, we attempt the most radical counterprogramming we could imagine: a show made up entirely of stories about delight.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: In these dark, combative times, we attempt the most radical counterprogramming we could imagine: a show made up entirely of stories about delight.
item.itunes:summary: In these dark, combative times, we attempt the most radical counterprogramming we could imagine: a show made up entirely of stories about delight.

item.title: 691: Gardens of Branching Paths
item.description: Stories of other universes that are just like our own, but with one small difference.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Stories of other universes that are just like our own, but with one small difference.
item.itunes:summary: Stories of other universes that are just like our own, but with one small difference.

item.title: 690: Too Close to Home
item.description: For the holidays, stories of families finally addressing the thorny thing they’ve never really talked about.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: For the holidays, stories of families finally addressing the thorny thing they’ve never really talked about.
item.itunes:summary: For the holidays, stories of families finally addressing the thorny thing they’ve never really talked about.

item.title: 689: Digging Up the Bones
item.description: There's a lot that can be gained from unearthing the past -- learning about oneself, learning about others. But, it doesn't always go how you'd expect.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: There's a lot that can be gained from unearthing the past -- learning about oneself, learning about others. But, it doesn't always go how you'd expect.
item.itunes:summary: There's a lot that can be gained from unearthing the past -- learning about oneself, learning about others. But, it doesn't always go how you'd expect.

item.title: 688: The Out Crowd
item.description: Reports from the frontlines of the Trump administration's "Remain in Mexico" asylum policy.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Reports from the frontlines of the Trump administration's "Remain in Mexico" asylum policy.
item.itunes:summary: Reports from the frontlines of the Trump administration's "Remain in Mexico" asylum policy.

item.title: 687: Small Things Considered
item.description: Stories about being little. Secret writings in tiny letters. The power of a very small number. And a medication that's supposed to cure shortness.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Stories about being little. Secret writings in tiny letters. The power of a very small number. And a medication that's supposed to cure shortness.
item.itunes:summary: Stories about being little. Secret writings in tiny letters. The power of a very small number. And a medication that's supposed to cure shortness.
